alert.note: Alert for Jefferson; St. Louis (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Saint Louis (Eastern Missouri and West Central Illinois)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 20 at 9:51AM CST until February 21 at 7:36PM CST by NWS Saint Louis
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Missouri... Meramec River near Eureka. ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Missouri... Meramec River at Valley Park. River forecasts are based on observed precipitation and forecast precipitation for the next 48 hours. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL TOMORROW EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Meramec River near Eureka. * WHEN...Until tomorrow evening. * IMPACTS...At 21.0 feet, West Spring River Road becomes inundated at this height. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:30 AM CST Sunday the stage was 20.2 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 9:30 AM CST Sunday was 20.8 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage this afternoon and continue falling to 6.3 feet Saturday morning. - Flood stage is 19.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (12 pm CST) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Mon Tue Wed Thu Fri Meramec River Eureka 19.0 20.2 Sun 9 am 13.2 8.3 7.7 7.5 6.8 &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. This product, along with additional weather and stream information, is available at https://water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=lsx.
